title: [LFT] Diamond 4 Adc PLAT/DIA+ rank team
body:
Looking for a rank team that will climb pretty high, play couple times a week on schedule. Add me on league : "**Squirtle**" for details.
**Current pool**: {{champion:81}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:15}} [experienced 50+ games 'atleast' each]
(trying to **learn**  for rank team) : {{champion:429}} {{champion:42}} 
Support that would suit me would be very helpful botlane :-).
Current : **Diamond 4**
